title._content: [Portrait of Larry Adler, City Center, New York, N.Y., ca. Jan. 1947] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Larry Adler, City Center, New York, N.Y., ca. Jan. 1947] 1 negative : b&w ; 2 1/4 x 2 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 002 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Adler, Larry Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Harmonica players--1940-1950. City Center Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950.
